text: Maintaining and enhancing Social Security is a practical decision, not just a moral one. It is an established system that many people depend on for their financial stability. By maintaining and enhancing it, we can ensure that it continues to function effectively and meet the needs of its beneficiaries. Furthermore, the enhancement could include necessary updates and improvements that could make the system more efficient and beneficial for all.
